items.sentence: Tom didn't think his boss's plan was a viable one.
I suppose I'm going to have to teach you a lesson.
I don't know whether this'll be of any use to you.
I went on vacation, and my plants are still alive.
You won't be able to hide from the police forever.
I'm a grouch before I have my first cup of coffee.
You could tell that Tom and Mary liked each other.
He who justifies himself too much accuses himself.
It's not just Tom and Mary who have made mistakes.
Tom has always looked after his cars fastidiously.
